mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mplan_music (mp_artist, mp_title, mp_album, mp_lyric, mp_year, mp_corp, mp_img, mp_imgsize, mp_imgo, mp_320k, mp_320size, mp_320ko, mp_192k, mp_192size, mp_192ko, mp_useyn, mp_insert_date) values (#{artist}, #{title}, #{album}, #{lyric}, #{year}, #{corp}, #{fimgName}, #{imgsize}, #{uploadFimgName}, #{f320Name}, #{m320size}, #{uploadF320Name}, #{f192Name}, #{m192size}, #{uploadF192Name}, 'Y', NOW()) ;
